item.title: There are several pot holes between House on the Green and Brook Cottage which are extremely dangerous to the elderly, 23rd January
item.description:
There are several dangerous pot holes along this short stretch of Church Lane particularly to the elderly. This is the only access to the Church, Bus stop Village Hall activities and needs fixing now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Flooded gutters, 23rd January
item.description:
Continuing problem, reported at least 3 times. Inadequate drainage system. Overflowing drains for week outside Roseville and affecting several properties from there towards Cheltenham. Difficulty leaving properties on foot for example outside 1 Little Hills Cottages due to the amount of flooding outside the house and traffic driving through the water at speed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep 30x60cm pothole danger to cyclists, 23rd January
item.description:
There is a large pothole in the middle of the road, which is a danger to cyclists with copious amounts of loose gravel surrounding causing a skid risk. There are multiple other smaller potholes surrounding this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Birch Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole before junction to Evesham road, 23rd January
item.description:
Significant pothole just before exit of Cleevelands Drive onto Evesham Road junction. Only entrance/exit to cleevelands estate. One larger pothole towards centre of the lane with tarmac crumbling around it. Deteriorated in the last few days presumably because of the weather conditions
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cleevelands Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
